scripts.beers:allocate: docker compose --env-file backend/.envrc -f backend/compose.yaml run server eval "BeerStars.Release.allocate_beers()"
scripts.backend:down: docker compose --env-file backend/.envrc -f backend/compose.yaml down --volumes postgres electric
scripts.backend:start: yarn electric:pull && docker compose --env-file backend/.envrc -f backend/compose.yaml up postgres electric
scripts.backend:up: yarn electric:pull && docker compose --env-file backend/.envrc -f backend/compose.yaml up --detach postgres electric
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose --env-file backend/.envrc -f backend/compose.yaml run server eval "BeerStars.Release.migrate()"
scripts.server:down: docker compose --env-file backend/.envrc -f backend/compose.yaml down --volumes --rmi local server
scripts.server:start: docker compose --env-file backend/.envrc -f backend/compose.yaml up --build server
scripts.server:up: docker compose --env-file backend/.envrc -f backend/compose.yaml up --build --detach server
scripts.services:up: yarn backend:up && sleep 2 && yarn db:migrate && yarn server:up
